```{r setup, include = FALSE}
needed_packages <- c("here", "fs", "glue", "english", "ratlas",
                     "knitr", "kableExtra", "ggplot2", "systemfonts")
load_packages <- function(x) {
  if (!(x %in% installed.packages())) {
    install.packages(x, repos = "https://cran.rstudio.com/")
  }
  
  suppressPackageStartupMessages(require(x, character.only = TRUE))
}
vapply(needed_packages, load_packages, logical(1))

options(knitr.kable.NA = "")
set_theme_ratlas(font = "Archivo Narrow",
                 plot_margin = margin(0, 10, 10, 10))

require_font("Archivo Narrow")
```
